entry.title: New release for CoreControl: v0.0.4
entry.content:
[!CAUTION]
CoreControl is at an early stage of development and is subject to change. It is not recommended for use in a production environment at this time.

[‚≠ê] - New Features - Uptime History ‚Äì All uptime checks of each application are saved and can be displayed in a clearly arranged page, filtered by the last 30 minutes, 7 days and 30 days #3 - New User System ‚Äì The user data is now stored in a database and can be changed in the settings. No need to edit the compose.yml anymore! #4 - UI Improvements ‚Äì Many UI improvements throughout the application, including the login area, the dashboard, the network diagram and the settings page - Documentation ‚Äì The WIP Documentation page is now available at https://corecontrol.gitbook.io/docs/ - Small README changes

[!WARNING]
Due to the new user system, the login data for existing installations is also set to the email admin@example.com and the password admin. These can then be changed in the settings.

entry.title: New release for CoreControl: v0.0.6

I recommend adapting your existing docker compose as well
